description: A request for proposal from the department of National Defence for the procurement of various aviation replacement parts
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Notice of Proposed Procurement

* Title: Aviation Replacement Parts
* Reference Number: PW-22-01003641
* Solicitation Number: W8485-227025/B

## Tender Details

* **Date of Publication**: August 8, 2022
* **Closing Date and Time**: August 23, 2022, 2:00 PM (EST)
* **NAICS (Canadian Classification)**: 52310 - Aircraft and Aircraft Parts Manufacturing
* **Tender Type**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Method**: Identified by adversary`s submission

## Procurement Process

* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Response deadline: August 23, 2022, 2:00 PM (EST)
* This project is subject to the Controlled Goods Program under the Defense Production Act and Export Control List.

## Enter Supplier Information

* Interested suppliers should submit their proposals electronically via the following link:
	+ [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/08/c2f40d6f319ab908101887943ba76bc8/rfp_-_w8485-227025b_-_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/08/c2f40d6f319ab908101887943ba76bc8/rfp_-_w8485-227025b_-_fr.pdf) for the French version of the RFP.
	+ [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/08/934f9e5056d860d605811b2f7668ff56/rfp_-_w8485-227025b-_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/08/934f9e5056d860d605811b2f7668ff56/rfp_-_w8485-227025b-_eng.pdf) for the English version of the RFP.

## Contact Information

* Name: Steve Duval-Urbain
* Email: [steve.duvalurbain@forces.gc.ca](mailto:steve.duvalurbain@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: 999-999-9999

Note that this rewritttext is minimalistic and simple but detailed and careful. Note that the output is well-form
